snippet: Topher Grace and Olivia Thirlby have joined the cast of Paul Weitz’s new comedy, “Lonely, I’m Not,” at the Off Broadway Second Stage Theater.
abstract: Actors Topher Grace and Olivia Thirlby join the cast of Paul Weitz’s comedy play Lonely, I’m Not at the Off Broadway Second Stage Theater.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Topher Grace and Olivia Thirlby have joined the cast of Paul Weitz’s new comedy, “Lonely, I’m Not,” at the Off Broadway Second Stage Theater.

headline.main: Film Actors Join Paul Weitz Play
headline.print_headline: Film Actors Join Paul Weitz Play
